Articles.Content:
I recently tried landing on the Mun to begin my first attempts at EVA on said Mun, but landing is very hard on hilly areas, is there a map to show me where there is a really flat area?

Also any other tips on landing, especially with the new parts

for beginners, you can try that really massive dark crater, its pretty flat..

(although i think its really a dried up lake you can see river/canyon systems radiating from it)
as above, if you want smoother landing areas, aim for the craters.
The KGSS (see forum sig) has maps of all the known celestial bodies.
